comment._content:
About 1888 (see notes).  

This might be a rare photo of the first Pyrmont Bridge (1857).

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This one isn't much help...the firm Michael Boylson & Sons was dissolved in April 1887...the goodwill and assets were purchased by Michael Boylson and Thomas Boylson (sons of Michael Snr)...who appear to have continued trading under the same name at 276 Sussex St ('Business Announcements', column 5) - nla.gov.au/nla.news-article13656509

comment.author: 35672655@N00
comment._content: thats actually John Keep warehouse,not stanway house. built 1883. It was cities tallest building at 7 storeys 100ft.
